title: Gnocchi With Mushroom Sauce
summary: The recipe Gnocchi With Mushroom Sauce could satisfy your Mediterranean craving in around 15 minutes. This recipe serves 3. One portion of this dish contains approximately 13g of protein, 22g of fat, and a total of 494 calories. For $6.8 per serving, this recipe covers 16% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe is liked by 5 foodies and cooks. Not a lot of people really liked this main course. If you have shiitake mushrooms, butter, olive oil, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 53%. This score is solid. Try Herb Gnocchi with Mushroom Sauce, Gnocchi with Mushroom Alfredo Sauce, and Gnocchi With Creamy-Mushroom and Leek Sauce for similar recipes.

winePairing.pairingText: Chianti, Trebbiano, and Verdicchio are my top picks for Italian. Italians know food and they know wine. Trebbiano and Verdicchio are Italian white wines that pair well with fish and white meat, while Chianti is a great Italian red for heavier, bolder dishes. The Piccini Chianti Classico with a 4.6 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 10 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Piccini Chianti Classico
productMatches.description: Bright ruby with a hint of purple. Plum, violet notes mix with lush, ripe wild berries. Expansive and alive on the palate, with a lingering, velvety mouth feel. The long finish is buried in fruit.A versatile wine, best served at 64ÂºF, fantastic with juicy red meats, grilled or roasted.
